name: IPSUnified
description: An Implementation Guide for the IPS unified bundle schema.

resource.name: IPS Unified AllergyIntolerance
resource.description: AllergyIntolerance entries in the IPS Unified bundle.

resource.name: IPS Unified Bundle
resource.description: A Bundle containing exactly one Patient, one Organization, and zero-or-more of the other IPS resources.

resource.name: IPS Unified Condition
resource.description: Condition entries in the IPS Unified bundle.

resource.name: IPS Unified Medication
resource.description: Medication entries in the IPS Unified bundle.

resource.name: IPS Unified MedicationRequest
resource.description: MedicationRequest entries in the IPS Unified bundle.

resource.name: IPS Unified Observation
resource.description: Observation entries in the IPS Unified bundle.

resource.name: IPS Unified Organization
resource.description: The Organization resource as used in the IPS Unified bundle.

resource.name: IPS Unified Patient
resource.description: The Patient resource as used in the IPS Unified bundle.
